name: AWAY: The Survival Series
description:
EXPLORE. DISCOVER. SURVIVE.
Set in a distant future, AWAY pits you against nature in your journey across a decaying planet. As you explore the world through the eyes of the nimble little Sugar Glider, the only question is: Do you have what it takes to survive?A NEW SERIES AWAITS
Each episode of the AWAY series takes you on a new animal's adventures through radically different environments.
Set to release this spring, the game's first episode stars the Sugar Glider and introduces you to a mysterious new world of danger and opportunity.A BRAND NEW EXPERIENCE
Equal parts action & adventure, AWAY takes you on the Sugar Glider's journey through a world in decay, discovering new secrets every step of the way.
Whether on the ground or in the air, predators and prey of all shapes and sizes await as you make your way through the perilous world of AWAY.NATURE DOCUMENTARY: EVOLVED
Blurring the line between video game and wildlife documentary, an all-seeing narrator accompanies your Sugar Glider on its journey through nature.
The deeper you go, the more you learn about your surroundings as you piece together the increasingly mysterious origins of AWAY...A FEAST FOR THE SENSES
Experience wilderness like never before as AWAY's enchanting orchestral soundtrack accompanies you through the game's visually stunning environments.
Having worked on countless major soundtracks, ranging from games like Resident Evil, Call of Duty, and Destiny to movies such as Mad Max, Transformers, and Planet Earth II, Mike Raznick brings his experience as a multi-award winning composer and audio director to the AWAY series.AWAY IN VIRTUAL REALITY
AWAY is also coming to VR! Get your HTC Vive ready and embark on a beautifully immersive journey through nature. Breathtaking vistas and mysterious adventures await as you explore the world through the eyes of the beast.
